Layer.onMouseUp

Function/Meaning
Mouse button released
Type
Event of the Layer class
Syntax
onMouseUp(x, y, button, shift)
Arguments
x The x-coordinate of the position where the mouse button was released (in layer display coordinates).
y The y-coordinate of the position where the mouse button was released (in layer display coordinates).
button The mouse button that was released. It will be one of the following values:
mbLeft : The left mouse button was released
mbMiddle : The middle mouse button was released
mbRight : The right mouse button was released
mbX1 : The first side mouse button was released
mbX2 : The second side mouse button was released
shift The state of the shift keys pressed at the same time the mouse button was released. It is a combination of the following values using bitwise OR.
ssAlt : The ALT key was pressed
ssShift : The SHIFT key was pressed
ssCtrl : The CTRL key was pressed
Description
Occurs when a mouse button is released.
